related_questions.question: Bantu jawab ya kaka kaka please​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

  1. saw
  2. went
  3. invited
  4. made
  5. bought
  6. didn't
  7. told
  8. gave
  9. took
  10. watch

Penjelasan:

Jadi, past tense itu tenses yang menjelaskan kalimat di masa lampau, verbs dalam soal tinggal dijadiin bentuk past atau V2.

related_questions.question:
1. Siwi and Mr. Haryo are building a sandcastle.    The underlined word means
2. My mother has a son, he is my
3. Look at the picture!
He is ... a horse​

3. Ms. Gina : Have you taken your lunch?
Sandy
Ms. Gina : Well, let's go find some meals.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

3. Ms. Gina : Have you taken your lunch?

Sandy: No, I have not.

Ms. Gina : Well, let's go find some meals.​

Penjelasan:

Pertanyaan dari Ms.Gina menggunakan bentuk Present Perfect Tense karena dia bertanya apakah Sandy sudah makan atau belum. Maka jawaban sesuai dengan kalimat yang dicetak tebal, yaitu memberitahukan bahwa Sandy belum makan, karenanya, Ms.Gina mengajak Sandy untuk mencari makanan bersama.

Semoga membantu ya.

water

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

jadi jawabanya…

related_questions.question: It is a kind of close.it is worn to cover the body in the clod weather.it is a​

Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

Jawaban:

contoh present continuous:

I am eating

he is playing basket ball

me and my family are visiting our uncle home

Penjelasan:

Rumus: S + to be + Verb-ing

Present Continuous Tense bisa digunakan untuk menceritakan sebuah kejadian atau kegiatan yang dilakukan dalam kurun waktu tertentu dan masih berlangsung sampai sekarang.
